Vietnamese – http://ric-zai-inc.com/ric.php?page=detail&id=COPS-P087 70 2015 COPS Anti-Gang Initiative (CAGI) Grant Owner’s Manual 2015 COPS Anti-Gang Initiative (CAGI)
Grant Owner’s Manual This manual was created to assist COPS Anti-Gang Initiative (CAGI) grantees with the administrative and financial matters
associated with their grant. For more information about your CAGI grant, please contact your COPS Grant Program Specialist. If you do not
know the name or telephone number of your Grant Program Specialist, please contact the COPS Office Response
Center at 800-421-6770. U.S. Department of Justice
Office of Community Oriented Policing Services
145 N Street NE
Washington, DC 20530
Visit the COPS Office online: www.cops.usdoj.gov Published 2015
